title: Handle a Product Catalog Update Request
description: A retailer notices that a product in the online catalog has an incorrect description. They report it to customer support.

tasks.description: Receive the report from the retailer about the incorrect product description.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands which product has the error.

tasks.description: Verify the correct product description from the master product information system.
Update the product description in the online catalog.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully corrects the description on the website.
